metadata.title: CVE-2024-36041 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[ksmserver: Unauthorized users can access session manager]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36041` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcolorcorrect5 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
libkfontinst5 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
libkfontinstui5 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
libkworkspace5-5 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
libnotificationmanager1 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
libplasma-geolocation-interface5 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
libtaskmanager6 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
libweather-ion7 - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
plasma-workspace - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
plasma-workspace-data - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
plasma-workspace-wayland - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
sddm-theme-breeze - 4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: plasma-workspace package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:5.27.11-0ubuntu4.1').
